item.title: multipass教程
item.description: How to create an instance create a instance ## 创建一个默认实例 $ multipass launch Launched: enjoyed-coatimundi ## 查看实例详情 $ multipass info enjoyed-coatimundi Name: enjoyed-coatimundi State: Running IPv4: 192.168.64.2 Release: Ubuntu 20.04.4 LTS Image hash: 75a04c7eed58 (Ubuntu 20.04 LTS) Load: 0.05 0.15 0.08 Disk usage: 1.4G out of 4.7G Memory usage: 139.4M out of 976.9M Mounts: -- create an instance with a specific image ## 查找可用的镜像 $ multipass find Image Aliases Version Description snapcraft:core18 18.
